components.ad-unit: Ads suck, but that's how we keep the lights on. Please whitelist us in your adblocker.

onboarding.about: This is the global activity feed. It's populated by recent activity from all of Kitsu's users - even you! Once you've had a chance to follow a few more interesting users, we'll switch your default feed from Global to Following.
onboarding.action: Why don't you try creating a feed post to introduce yourself using the form below? You can say something as simple as 'Hey everyone, I'm new to Kitsu', or you can show us how creative and witty you are!

empty.html: Media you've added or updated within your ''Library'' will show up here for you to quickly update.

group-invite.revoked: Your invitation has been revoked by a group moderator.
group-invite.subtitle: You have been invited to {group} by {sender}
group-invite.text: You'll be able to access {group}'s page after accepting this invite. We'll redirect you after accepting.

activity.feed-restricted: This is a restricted group. Anyone can comment, only leaders can create posts.

errors.neighbors-same: You can't add your group as a neighbor.

about.desc: Explain your group's purpose in depth, share important information, or anything else.

avatar.desc: This image will be used throughout Kitsu to identify your group.

category.desc: Kitsu uses categories to organize groups to help users find more of what they love.

cover.desc: This image will appear at the top of your group's page on desktops. Sides may be cropped slightly based on the viewer's screen size.

name.desc: Group names should clearly communicate what your group is about, but you can still be creative and have fun with it!

neighbors.desc: Add related groups to your Neighborhood so your members can discover new communities!

privacy.desc: Your privacy settings determine how open or closed your group is to the public. If you choose to make your group private, you will NOT be able to make it public in the future.

rules.desc: Set out some guidelines for your group members to follow. These rules are Markdown supported!

tagline.desc: Summarize the purpose of your group in 60 characters or less. You'll have room to add more information later.

reaction-modal.edit-warning: Careful! Editing will delete your upvotes.

body.header: Before you block this person, we want to let you know how blocking will work.
body.text: Blocking this person will make it so that their content is no longer visible to you, and your content will no longer be visible or interactable for them.

confirm.check: Are you sure you want to do this?

report-content.header: You can only report this content once.
report-content.reason: Please give a reason for reporting this content.
report-content.status: The current status of your report: {status}

reaction-modal.placeholder: {index, plural, =0 {Got me rethinking some important life decisions.} =1 {Unexpectedly good! Lots of memorable scenes.} =2 {While it may not be everyone's cup of tea, it's certainly interesting.} other {Overrated, don't waste your time on this one.}}

account.confirm-text: We're sorry to see you go, are you sure you want to continue?
account.sub-header: Danger Zone! Deleting your account is irreversible.

blocking.sub-header: Once you block someone, that person can no longer tag you, follow you, view your profile, or see your feed posts.
blocking.title: Block Users

exports.disabled: Your MAL Export has been disabled due to the following reason: ''{reason}''

modal.helper: We'll update your anime and manga lists on {site} every time you update them on Kitsu.

exports.no-logs: We're processing your library and syncing it with MyAnimeList. Hold tight!
exports.sub-header: Automatically sync your library updates from Kitsu to MyAnimeList.

imports.error: It seems like your import has failed :( — We want to get this fixed for you so please ''email'' us.

index.adult-message: With adult content hidden, you won't see R18+ media in the feed, libraries, or search.

descriptions.replies: Someone ''replies'' to my post or comment

newsletter.message: If enabled, you will receive occasional (and very witty) email updates about Kitsu written by Josh himself.

privacy.message: If disabled, your posts will only be available to your followers and guests to your profile.

onboarding.about: As you continue to use Kitsu your ''Personal Feed'' below will begin to populate with the anime and manga you've watched, read, completed, and plan to check out. You can also post text, images, and videos to your feed using the form below. Your posts will be seen and appreciated by your followers and users from the global feed.
onboarding.action: Make yourself at home! Upload an avatar and cover image! Click ''Edit'' above to get started.
